name: Neo-Tokyo Arcade
description:
Run an arcade based in futuristic Neo-Tokyo!

Click the empty spaces to install better and more popular arcade games, tap the machines to collect your coins - but watch out, don't let your machines fill up or they'll go out of order!

This game was made for the Clicker Game Jam and is currently in a VERY early build, please check back in future for potential updates! 

Link to jam page - https://itch.io/jam/mrquickgame-clicker-jam

Made by:

Isaac Tattersall - programming, sound design

Kaela Tattersall - art and animation

https://setsulko.deviantart.com
